reviews.text:
I stayed in Paris for 3 days. Every day, I stopped by here to buy my pastries...

The ladies were very nice. They were very eager to help you which one you...

Excellent croissants and coffee! The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is cozy. Perfect spot for breakfast before exploring the city...

Highly recommend the pain au chocolat.

The bakery has good pastries but can get quite crowded in the morning. Service is decent but sometimes slow during peak hours...

Prices are reasonable for the location.
